# Biostring

https://stackoverflow.com/questions/26600735/matching-and-counting-strings-k-mer-of-dna-in-r

```{r}
#install.packages("stringi")
#library("stringi")
library("Biostrings")

data = read.table(file='~/Documents/Data/human/regionG4Uniq.tsv')
colnames(data) = c("ID","Sequence")

# Fonction calcul de la matrice de distance des k-mer
fbio <- function(x){
    t(sapply(x, function(x){x1 <-  DNAString(x); oligonucleotideFrequency(x1,3)}))
}

DNAlst = data$Sequence[1:100]
name = data$ID[1:100]
result = fbio(DNAlst)
rownames(result) = name

```
